Pizza Tower Version Downloader uses DepotDownloader v3.1.0 for its automatic version downloading feature, to download older versions of Pizza Tower directly from Steam.

You can download the used version of DepotDownloader and its source code, licensed under the GPL version 2 (see DepotDownloader/LICENSE), here: https://github.com/SteamRE/DepotDownloader/releases/tag/DepotDownloader_3.1.0

It also uses xdelta v3.1.0 to identify xdelta patches. You can download its source code (licensed under the Apache Public License version 2.0) here:
https://github.com/jmacd/xdelta
